virtuousCycle.title: The Virtuous Cycle
virtuousCycle.subtitle: Build Time → Capture Knowledge → Create Wealth → Reinvest
virtuousCycle.description: My life philosophy centers around creating a virtuous cycle where building time leads to capturing knowledge, which enables creating wealth, which gets reinvested into building more time. This isn't about accumulating for accumulation's sake, but about creating sustainable systems that amplify positive impact while maintaining balance and meaning.

phases.title: Build Time
phases.description: Create systems, automation, and efficiencies that give you back time and mental bandwidth.

phases.title: Capture Knowledge
phases.description: Use that time to learn, experiment, and build capabilities that compound over time.

phases.title: Create Wealth
phases.description: Transform knowledge and capabilities into sustainable value creation.

phases.title: Reinvest
phases.description: Deploy resources to amplify the cycle and create positive impact for others.
